alert.note: Alert for Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:25PM EDT until June 14 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR IRWIN...SOUTHEASTERN TURNER...NORTHERN TIFT AND SOUTH CENTRAL BEN HILL COUNTIES... At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Ashburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Mystic, Chula, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville Airport, Harding, Waterloo, Pinetta, Inaha and Sunsweet. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
